name: ThreeDify Inc
overview:
ThreeDify is an innovative 3D software technology company located in Ottawa, Canada, that produces a variety of lightweight 3D design, model viewing and graphing tools deployed as add-ons to Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint and Word. We also offer highly efficient and easy-to-use mining software solutions. Our products make 3D accessible and mining software affordable.

ThreeDify Excel Grapher has been described by many of our customers as a brilliant graphing tool. With a few mouse clicks, users can create a wide range of 3D scatter graphs, line graphs, surfaces, water-tight solids. It is the simplest and robust tool available to anyone who needs to visualize spreadsheet data in 3D. Our core Designer product is an ideal solution for those who want to reduce the expense of additional licenses for CAD solutions or 3D development suites like Max or Maya. Our Office Designer can simplify your designer and review process by allowing users to 3D digital-mock up their documents. Also, 3D PowerPoint presentation will impress your audience with the WOW factor.

A combination of subject-matter expertise and know-how is the foundation of the robust and creative mining software solutions we provide. We specialize in developing lean, scalable, robust and affordable solutions for the mining industry. Underpinning GeoModeler is its state-of-the-art linear octree-based hybrid modeling scheme that handles large and complex orebody with the ease and precision. In addition, the advanced computation speed makes FlowPit an innovative pit optimization tool for medium and long term planning . With FlowPit, you no longer need to reduce your block model dimensions, and you can even obtain the optimal solution in a shorter time frame than other pit optimizers that use super-blocking!

In addition ThreeDify also develops, sells and supports component libraries (static LIBs or COM DLLs) for general purpose 3D modelling, gaming, and for highly specialized applications such as geological modelling and mine planning. Our strong multidisciplinary team also provides tailored professional services to meet and exceed client’s needs based on our core technologies.
